title: Customized Training Program for Strengthening Mathematical Competencies of Older Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using digital devices (tablets/laptops), providing customized content reflecting learners' job characteristics and career levels

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic statistics (mean, standard deviation, regression analysis) for work-related data analysis
Learners can present solutions to practical problems (budget planning, risk assessment) through mathematical modeling
Learners can simulate math-based decision-making processes using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
